message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and leave you with 10%.  We can work things out from there.
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Let's meet in the middle!
Okay, let's be reasonable. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%.  This is a fair compromise.
I'm not convinced 60% is fair. I'll meet you halfway between 40% and 50%
